title: Resources & Forms
subtitle: Access the official tools, templates, and forms from the Somali Data Protection Authority (DPA).

registrationForm.title: Data Controller/Processor Registration Form
registrationForm.desc: For organizations to register with the DPA.

authNotifForm1.title: Prior Authorization Request Form
authNotifForm1.desc: Required before processing high-risk personal data.

authNotifForm2.title: Cross-Border Data Transfer Application Form
authNotifForm2.desc: To seek DPA approval for international data flows.

riskTools.title: Record of Processing Activities (ROPA) Template
riskTools.desc: Required log of all personal data processing.

rightsRequestForm.title: Data Subject Rights Request Form
rightsRequestForm.desc: Used by individuals to access, correct, or delete their data.

dpiaTemplate.title: DPIA (Data Protection Impact Assessment) Template
dpiaTemplate.desc: Tool for identifying and mitigating privacy risks.

orgComplianceGuide.title: Compliance Guide for Organizations
orgComplianceGuide.desc: Checklist and practical tips for institutional compliance.

publicGuide.title: Data Protection Guide for the Public
publicGuide.desc: Practical guide to understanding your privacy rights.
